nhi.name: Nhi Mai-Do
nhi.about: I'm an aspiring software developer from Vancouver, Canada. In my spare time, I enjoy longboarding and combat sports.

projects.title: Formica
projects.description: An in-discord form service that allows you to fill in forms via a discord bot. You can create and manage forms, as well as manage your responses via a web interface.

projects.title: Don't Fear the Reaper!
projects.description: A 2D hide n' seek game, where you can play as the grim reaper where the objective is to hunt down the TBD (To Be Deceased). Or, you can play as the TBD, with a goal of escaping the reaper's catacombs before he finds you.

projects.title: The Education Game
projects.description: An educational game for children with autism, intended to improve their development in 3 skill areas: arithmetic, emotion recognition, and fine motor skills.

cristopher.name: Cristopher Cejudo
cristopher.about:
I am a third year Computational Engineering student at Tecnol√≥gico de Monterrey CSF with an interest in Full-Stack development, Cloud, and Machine Learning. Experienced with different technologies, quick learner and adaptable. 
I believe that the skills that I have acquire from different work experiences make me a good leader, and I am always trying to apply and polish them in any opportunity that comes in my way.

projects.title: Knowledge Rally
projects.description: Knowledge Rally is a contest based on points where participants answer questions based on knowledge from various categories: History, Science, Training, Sports, and Geography.

projects.title: S.E.R
projects.description: Multi platform mobille application that helps the users to become aware of how they dispose their waste and how to do it in a proper way

projects.title: Face Alignment System
projects.description: Multipataform C++ project that align a face of an input image by identifying the eyes region to obtain a translation, scale and angle to transform the image into a normalized and rotated representation of the face.
